node.title: The Messiah will be the son of Judah
node.segment: The Words of Genesis record Jacob's final blessing over his fourth son, Judah. They speak of one of his descnedants who will be righful ruler and will be honored by all nations.

node.title: The Messiah will be the son of David

node.title: The Messiah will be born of a virgin
node.segment: Isaiah is prophesying to King Ahaz of Judah who reigned from 732 to 716 BC.

node.title: The Messiah will come from Bethlehem
node.segment: This is the first of three prophecies which predict the place from which Messiah will come.
